name: LutecSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Gate light”
”Alexa, turn off the Garage light”
”Alexa, set the Gate light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
By working with Amazon Alexa, you can easily control LUTEC-compatible smart home devices such as lights just by talking to Alex Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap and Echo Show. 
 To get started, find LUTEC Smart skill and select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your LUTEC app account and discover your devices. When using the skill, you need to give suitable names for your different devices by changing the names in the App, for example, "Gate light", "Garage light" .
Here are some of the voice commands:
 "Alexa, turn on the Gate light"
 "Alexa, turn off the Garage light"
 "Alexa, set Garage light to 50 percent"
Currently supported device:
 Smart Light
